rdf:Description.dc:title: The elementary art book for grades 4-6 1996

rdf:Description.dc:description: This book is required to complete the 1996 edition of social studies 4, 5 and 6 correspondence courses
Basic resource in Alberta for social studies, grade 4, correspondence and/or distance education
